des: "This is a unique, highly-addictive variant of the traditional 'chocolate rice crispy treat.' You can do this 2 ways: Mix the chocolate chips into the rice to have chocolate throughout, or wait until the treats cool, then spread melted chocolate chips on top and cool for a hard, shell-like frosting. I prefer the latter..."
ins:
Mix corn syrup and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat until bubbling, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in chocolate chips and almond butter until melted.
Put rice cereal in a large bowl; mix in almond-chocolate mixture. Pour cereal mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish; cool for 1 hour before serving.
